/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting two parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and buildings.
